-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A debugger for the UUAG system.
--   
--   A debugger for the UUAG system.
@package uuagd
@version 0.1.0.2


-- | The code generation on the Haskell side.
module UUAGD.CodeGen
class CodeGen a
markupAlt :: CodeGen a => String -> String -> [a] -> a
markupNonTerminal :: CodeGen a => String -> a -> a
markupTerminal :: CodeGen a => String -> a -> a
markupAttrUsage :: CodeGen a => String -> String -> a -> a


-- | The Html code generator.
module UUAGD.Html.CodeGen
type Html = Markup
instance CodeGen Html

module Paths_uuagd
version :: Version
getBinDir :: IO FilePath
getLibDir :: IO FilePath
getDataDir :: IO FilePath
getLibexecDir :: IO FilePath
getDataFileName :: FilePath -> IO FilePath
getSysconfDir :: IO FilePath


-- | The HTML renderer.
module UUAGD.Html.Renderer

-- | Render the generated HTML as a HTML document.
render :: Html -> IO String
